about_the_game:
Play full Episode 1 in the DEMO version.

When Lucy dies during a police encounter, John is determined to create a time portal to bring his wife back. While he succeeds and happens to warn his love about her upcoming danger, things get difficult for him. His time travel brings chaos in the world, as his friends and hometown get affected. John needs to make decisions to save his friends and family, but can he save them all?
Delve into the adventure as you play as John, time travelling across various timelines and making choices to save people. Play across 4 episodes to know the story of the young scientist. Your choices determine the progress and intimacy with others. IT'S TIME to save the world...
The game contains:

4 episodes, that will determine the story of a couple
Multiple choices that will determine who will end up doing what
Interactive objects that you can use
Optional challenges that will earn you rewards

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Vista+
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 / Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega 8 / Intel UHD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 / Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega 11 / Intel UHD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 2

short_description: Play as a young scientist who invents a time portal and uses it to bring back his dead wife. Soon, things become chaotic in his life. Make choices and help people as you progress. Decide whom to save, your family or friends. Your choices determine the ending. Play full Episode 1 in the DEMO version.
